feed.title: Takashi Yabuta
feed.subtitle: A blog about technology and stuff related

entry.title: Fake Instagram, Fake Twitter
entry.content:
During the first year of college, I enrolled in iOS specialization at Code Path, a bootcamp on iOS development. The 10-week-program taught me how to make a fake Instagram app and a fake Twitter app. Here are the clips showing the apps.

  • Parstagram

Parstagram is a simplified version of Instagram. This app uses Parse as the database, and log-in and other basic features of Instagram are implemented. Check the repository on GitHub from this link.

  • Flixster

Flixster is a movie recommendation app. You can scroll movies and click a movie to check the detail. This app uses a movie database API. Check the repository on GitHub from this link.
entry.summary: During the first year of college, I enrolled in iOS specialization at Code Path, a bootcamp on iOS development. The 10-week-program taught me how to make a fake Instagram app and a fake Twitter app. Here are the clips showing the apps.
